testcase.classname: How much a customer can borrow
testcase.name: Borrowing estimate for a Single customer
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on the home loan borrow calculator page...............passed When user fills the form....................................................passed Then user clicks the "Work out how much I can borrow" button................passed Then user gets an estimate borrowing amount.................................passed

testcase.classname: How much a customer can borrow
